reviewText: I love Charlie Chaplin. Only issue is that this blue ray only works on B region players. Thanks for not putting that in any of the info. Kinda pissed I have to order another copy of the same movie.
One of chaplins best movies, DVD came in pefect condition and everything
Have problems getting it to work on my blm rei or my DVD player.
I got it and it was in Chinese. It never said anything like that in the description. It wouldn't play at all. Horrible decision.
